title: ‘This presidency is a brand-franchise’: Trump has taken the commercialization of politics to a new level
summary: Trump’s net worth has doubled to $5.4 billion since returning to office as he commercializes the presidency through luxury product sales, foreign real estate deals, and cryptocurrency ventures
